text:
e="preserve">Raheela Yahya Munawar () is a Pakistani politician who has been a Member of the Provincial Assembly of the Punjab, since June 2013. Previously, she has been a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan from 2002 to 2007.
Early life and education.
She was born on 10 June 1957 in [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gujranwala Gujranwala].<ref name="pap/2013">
She has completed graduation and earned the degree of Bachelor of Arts.
Political career.
She was elected to the [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Assembly_of_Pakistan National Assembly of Pakistan] as a candidate of [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan_Muslim_League_(Q) Pakistan Muslim League (Q)] on a reserved seat for women in [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistani_general_election,_2002 Pakistani general election, 2002]. In August 2003, she was appointed Parliamentary Secretary for Health.
She was elected to the [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Provincial_Assembly_of_the_Punjab Provincial Assembly of the Punjab] as a candidate of [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan_Muslim_League_(N) Pakistan Muslim League (N)] on a reserved seat for women in June 2013.
